rahula widyalaya asala pihiti chanda madhyasthanaya awata katawut postar galawa thibuna. 2011 okthobar masa 08 wani dina chandaya pawatheddi kenek awith sarayan chandana mahathata kiwa pansala langa chanda madhyasthanaya asala chanda kad bedanawa kiyala.

owunta anuwa, kandayam ananyathawaye pradhana nirnayakaya wanne jathiya, janawargaya ho aagama nowa purawasibhawaya yi.

mahajana thanathurak darana sakakaru adhikarana bhumiyedi me aakarayen hasirenne nam ohu waraya adhikariya thula hasirenne keseda yanna adhikaranayata sitha gatha haki bawa dhammika ranathunga sambandha nadu wibhagaya atharathura pradhana mahesthrath gihan pilapitiya prakasha kaleya.

ranil unnaheta wipaksha nayaka kama miya yana thek isilime wasanawa thibuna athara, parlimenthuwe hitapu ali menma eliye un yamak kamak kara gatha haki hama ekama, mahinda mahaththaya passe gos unge wada kara gaththeya.

1989 nowambar 13 da ewakata pawathi ejapa aanduwa wisin ghathanaya karana lada, janatha wimukthi peramune nirmathruwara, rohana wijewira athulu aragalaye di miya giya ja.wi.pe. samajikayan saha hithawathun dahas gananak anusmaranaya kerena 27 wana il maha wiru samaruwa, ‘sada samaramu sohoyuro’ themawa yatathe 13 da sawasa 3.00ta ema pakshaye nayakayange saha samajikayange sahabhagithwayen kolambaa wiharamaha dewi udyanaye elamahan ranga pitaye di pawathwimata katayuthu sudanam kara atha.
ema sawadya bawata pracharaya wana lipiya kathanayaka, shri lanka parlimenthuwa yana lipi shirshaya yatathe kathanayaka karu jayasuriya mahathage athsanin yuthuwa dakwa thibe ෴

sulu nadu wibhaga kirime ha marana dandanaya ka්riyathmaka kirime balaya cheka balakayata pawara thibuni.

eeeta passe herun hathara dena penwamin "ee dipa hathare rajakam karapu rajawarun hathara dena me thama.ee rajawarunge aga bisowun hathara dena balaganna" kiyala kuttame porowa hathara aragena pennuwa."hathara maha rajawarunta purohitha kam karanne me hathara dena" kiyala buru kola hathara idiripath kala.dahaya kolen dasa raja dharmayath nawaye kolen nawa arahadi budu gunath ata sil ate kolenuth hathe kolen sath sathiyath me widihata idiripath kala.uthuru dakunu nagenahira basnahira uda yata sadisawanta arakgath guru demapiya hithamithuranta wandum pidum garu sathkara karamin pansil rakimin me sathara mahadwipa wasiyo samayen ha sathuten wisu bawa kiyamin haye pahe kola pennuwa.hathare kolayen ema rajunta ha rata wassanta seth pathana sathara waram dewiyanuth thunthara bodhiya thune kolenuth dedew lowata adhipathi sak dewiyan deke kolenuth pahadili wanne yayi" kiyanakota ahagena hitiya pirisa maha hayiyen sadukara denna una.eeta passe wechcha dewal boruwata kiyala wadak nane.hama janakathawakatama supurudu paridi eegollo samayen sathuten jiwath unalu.
